original_text: The bronze walls of the ‘Sea’ were 7½ centimetres thick. Its top edge was like a cup in the shape of a lily flower. The ‘Sea’ contained about 65,000 litres of water.
korean_text: 바다의 두께는 한 손 너비만 하고 그 둘레는 잔 둘레와 같이 백합화의 모양으로 만들었으니 그 바다에는 삼천 밧을 담겠으며

sentences.original_text: The bronze walls of the 'Sea' were 7½ centimetres thick.
Its top edge was like a cup
in the shape of a lily flower.
The 'Sea' contained about 65,000 litres of water.
